column2: The Trade Guild for the [From.GetTradeGuildHQ] has been founded in [From.GetName].

More and more traders arrive in [Root.GetName] from far off [route_origin.GetName], and with them come their [route_origin.Religion.GetName] missionaries. Their following has grown much larger in recent years, convincing many of my people away from the old ways.
I will ask them to come to the palace
Not I -- the old ways are best
